articles.title: First state-level look at long COVID reveals the seven hardest-hit states - Ars Technica
articles.description: New England and the Pacific tended to have lower rates of long COVID.
articles.content:
Enlarge/ A woman with Long COVID who is completely bedridden, requiring the use of a wheelchair to move between rooms of her home.

articles.title: TikTok launches a ‘reimagined’ app for the Apple Vision Pro - TechCrunch
articles.description: TikTok has launched a native and "reimagined" app on the Apple Vision Pro, the company announced on Thursday.
articles.content: TikTok has launched a native and “reimagined” app on the Apple Vision Pro, the company announced on Thursday. The Vision Pro launched on February 2 and already has over 1,000 apps specifically design… [+2518 chars]

articles.title: SRK and YouTuber Technical Guruji collaborate to unveil Realme's new smartphone - Storyboard18
articles.description: The ad campaign is a part of a nine-minute long video episode titled ‘Zooming in with Real SRK’, hosted by Gaurav, popularly known as Technical Guruji. The video is accessible on Realme's YouTube channel.
